extends java.lang.Object

This class contains the functions for sending any email messages

Method Summary
static void sendMentionEmail(java.lang.String message)
          This will send the mention as an email message.
The email to and subject is based upon the values set in the Variables class.

Method Detail

sendMessage

public static void sendMessage(java.lang.String to,
                               java.lang.String toName,
                               java.lang.String from,
                               java.lang.String fromName,
                               java.lang.String subject,
                               java.lang.String message)
SendMessage will send an email message based upon the value of the given parameters

Parameters:
to - Email Address to send the email to
toName - The name of the person the email is being sent to
from - Email Address the email is sent from (Has to be registered for the AppEengine application)
fromName - The name the email appears from
subject - The subject of the email
message - The content of the actual email message
Throws:
javax.mail.internet.AddressException

sendTestMessage

public static void sendTestMessage()
This will send a test email message based upon the values in the Variables class.
This is only used when testing the application is working before implementing tweets.

sendMentionEmail

public static void sendMentionEmail(java.lang.String message)
This will send the mention as an email message.
The email to and subject is based upon the values set in the Variables class.

Parameters:
message - Formed of the tweet author and the tweet.
